title: Food Court 1
content: A popular food court with a variety of local and international cuisines.

title: The Deck
content: A dining spot with an array of Asian delights and refreshing beverages.

title: Frontier
content: A cozy café with a selection of gourmet sandwiches and artisanal coffee.

title: Arts Canteen
content: A canteen offering budget-friendly meals for students in the Arts faculty.

title: Engineering Cafeteria
content: A cafeteria serving hearty meals and snacks for engineering students.

title: Science Fusion
content: A fusion eatery providing science-themed dishes and drinks.

title: Business Bistro
content: A bistro with a business theme, serving delectable meals and desserts.

title: Medical Canteen
content: A canteen offering healthy and wholesome meals for medical students.

title: Techno Café
content: A tech-inspired café with modern menu options and free Wi-Fi.

title: Law Lounge
content: A lounge area with law-themed décor and light bites for law students.
